title: Leszek Borkowski
text: Leszek Borkowski (born 27 June 1952) is a Polish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201976%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Bantamweight">men's bantamweight</a> event at the <a href="1976%20Summer%20Olympics">1976 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1976 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Patrick%20Cowdell">Patrick Cowdell</a> of Great Britain.
